message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it holds immense value for someone with your business acumen.  I'm initially proposing a price of $1,000,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, of course.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you see in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. I am willing to pay $750,000 for the product.
Bob, thanks for your counter-offer. I understand your budgetary constraints, but my original pricing reflects the true value of this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $875,000?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your offer, but I still need to stick to my budget. I am willing to pay $850,000 for the product.
